Package: uniandes.unacloud.web.domain

[Groovy] Class PhysicalMachine

    • uniandes.unacloud.web.domain.PhysicalMachine

    • Entity to represent a host machine located in a computer room o laboratory

      Authors:
      CesarF

        • java.lang.Object availableResources()

          Calculates the available resources in physical machine querying current resources used by executions

          Returns:
          an object with available resources in this host. Physical Cores, Cores, Ram,

        • java.util.Collection<Platform> getAllPlatforms()

          Returns:
          laboratory where this Physical Machine belongs

        • java.lang.Object withExecution()

          Validates if physical machine has executions

          Returns:
          true in case there is at least one execution in machine, false in case not
